attributes.action: Make the owner of Snapchat bring the original 2D bitmojis back.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone that owns the app is complaining about the changes of the bitmojis. Nobody likes them and they are changing everything. Many people have wanted this to happen so here we are. Please get them back to 2d it’s what the people want.
attributes.background: Make the owner of Snapchat bring the original bitmojis back. Myself and many other have seen changes to the bitmoji characters and we all hate them. The original bitmojis were far better and everyone liked them better that way.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

This is a matter for Snapchat, not the Government or Parliament.
